dct_title_s: De vyerighe colom klaer vertoonende in onderscheydene curieuse caarten de XVII. Nederlantsche provincien, alsmede de hartogen, houtvesters en graven van Vlaenderen, Hollandt ende Zelandt met desselfs beschryving
dct_description_sm: Index: Vervolg van de kaerten, by hare nombers.
First 6 and last 6 pages blank (included in page description).
Decorative cartouches with figures and cherubs, title banners, bar scales, compass roses, coats of arms, ships.
Maps show property divisions (numbered), topography, vegetation, waterways, ports.
Colom's De Vyerighe Colom published in various editions between 1632 and 1662.
